english.segment1: I was so helpless. Where did the light go. I had no hope left. Deep down in my soul. I was watchin'. I was waitin'. I was prayin'. I was stayin' down on my knees. That's right where You found me
english.segment2: My Deliverer, You rescued me from all that held me captive. My Deliverer, You set me free. Now I'm alive and I can live. So every moment I will give you praise. My Deliverer. Ooh my Deliverer
english.segment3: There's no pretending. I can't do it myself. I'm so dependent. Lord I need Your help. I'll be watchin'. I'll be waitin'. I'll be prayin'. I'll be stayin' down on my knees. That's right where You'll find me
english.segment4: My Deliverer, You rescued me from all that held me captive. My Deliverer, You set me free. Now I'm alive and I can live. And every moment I will give you praise
english.segment5: La la la la la I need You. You know whatever I'm goin' through. I'll be watchin'. I'll be waitin'. I'll be prayin'. I'll be stayin' down on my knees. That's right where You'll find me
english.segment6: My Deliverer, You rescued me from all that held me captive. My Deliverer, You set me free. Now I can live. My Deliverer, I'm no longer captive. My Deliverer, You gave Your life that I might live. So every moment I will give you praise. Yeah my Deliverer. I'm gonna give You praise. I'm gonna give You praise. My Deliverer
